description: Who doesn't love a cooling&nbsp;margarita on a hot summer day? But why settle for the same old lime-and-tequila combo when you can take your cocktail to the next level with Moscato and fresh strawberries?Just add a handful of berries and a splash of&nbsp;sweet wine to your blender, and you're good to go. The result is a delicious, fruit-forward drink that's perfect for sipping by the pool.And if strawberries aren't your thing, you can always substitute&nbsp;pineapple,&nbsp;mango, or&nbsp;raspberry. So go ahead and experimentâ€”your taste buds will thank you!
